name: A I R (nologic)
description:
Welcome to A I R, a colorful party game that focuses on planning ahead, quick
thinking, and sabotage. In A I R, your main goal is to reach the goal number
 predetermined in the beginning of the game. Use a mixture of number, adjustment, and token cards to trip your opponents and secure your own victory. The game can be played with 3-5 players but any size group is enough to fully experience the game.

The link to the game can be found here: [ https://playingcards.io/wtpjm7 ]
